thread.title: ‘Abstract: The Art of Design’ Review: Great Design Gets the ‘Chef’s Table’ Treatment in Intimate Netflix Series
thread.title_full: ‘Abstract: The Art of Design’ Review: Great Design Gets the ‘Chef’s Table’ Treatment in Intimate Netflix Series

author: Liz Shannon Miller
title: ‘Abstract: The Art of Design’ Review: Great Design Gets the ‘Chef’s Table’ Treatment in Intimate Netflix Series
text: From shoes to New Yorker covers, the power of a strong visual aesthetic is at the center of this beautiful documentary series.
